sub_title: Business Mentor & Resilience Architect | Bespoke “Little Pivots” Method with East-meets-West fusion insights | Co-Pilot for Start-Up & Scale-Up Founders | Writer
summary:
Merging Eastern and Western values and strengths, I'm a seasoned business mentor, business builder and entrepreneur championing 'Little Pivots' - the power of subtle shifts to drive big changes. Spreading my roots in Europe, Africa, and Asia, I guide growth-hungry startups and scale-ups, leveraging two decades of expertise in technology, media, entertainment, consumer lifestyle goods, oil & gas and more.

My clientele spans from budding startup and scale-ups , serious solo-preneurs to investors, and government bodies. As Rockstart Accelerator's first female CEO in 2012 and an ASEAN Rice Bowl Start-Up Awards juror from 2016-2018, I've always been an active player in the startup and scale-up ecosystem.

Inspired by ancient philosophies, modern psychology and life experiences, I write on resilience, gifting lessons and tools to spur change for the greater good. 

I'm driven to boost business growth by pinpointing obstacles, crafting solutions, and plotting realistic plans. With resilience and 'Little Pivots', I believe leaders can act boldly and remain authentic.

A Malaysian world-citizen speaking five languages, I now call Amsterdam home alongside my French husband and two daughters.

profile_positions.company: The Resilience Mentor by Nina Justin
profile_positions.description:
The Resilience Mentor, supercharges startups and scale-ups by turning challenges into assets. 

She uniquely strengthens resilience on three levels: business, team, and individual. Drawing from 20 years of global expertise spanning 40 countries, Nina's mentorship is unparalleled. 

Unlike typical coaches, Nina offers actionable, hands-on advice, leveraging both her triumphs and setbacks. 

Through co-entrepreneurialism, she partners with clients, ensuring mutual goals and helping navigate business shifts. 

Nina empowers businesses with clear, actionable strategies, emphasising equal importance on both company and personal growth. Expect impactful guidance without the fluff, from a world-class expert.

profile_positions.description:
Founded in 2011, Riddhi is deep-rooted with the purpose of fueling and accelerating business expansion. It is committed to co-entrepreneurialism. We work hand-in-hand with our clients in various projects for growth and profitability especially in business development, sustainable revenue generation, strategic project management and the licensing of media content and technology.

We have an extensive and strong high-level network in the telecoms, mobile, TV and broadcasting industry (including OTT) especially in Europe, Middle East and Asia Pacific.

Starting from 2016, Riddhi is adding an additional focus to bring positive social impact on gender-balance economies, working with companies with female founders/CEOs. We strongly believe the overall health of the global economy would benefit from more female participation. Thus, we are placing our efforts to fill the space and boost gender diversity in entrepreneurship.

We are committed to bringing the positive “multiplier effect” of entrepreneurship amongst women who can serve as role models, mentors and investors in the complete business ecosystem in the next 20 years.

Clients list include SyQic Capital (United Kingdom & Singapore), S3 Group (Ireland), ONCubed (Italy), Smart Footfall (The Netherlands), Abel Organics (Netherlands).

volunteer_experiences.role: Representative Member for the Trip12 Global Community in the Netherlands
volunteer_experiences.description: Trip 12 is a rare genetic mutation which has recently been discovered (2016) by geneticist. The children and families affected by the genetic condition are scattered all around the world making a concerted effort to gather information, treatments and support, challenging. This Global Committee is an active work group which also acts as the spokesperson for the Trip12 families and children, with the aim of having a stronger voice for treatment possibilities, knowledge sharing as representing the entire community at the local and global level.
